thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Exponent Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.14

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Exponent Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.14
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Exponent Inc:
* EXPONENT REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 15 PERCENT TO $88.28 MILLION * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.14 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.47 EXCLUDING ITEMS * EXPECT FULL YEAR 2018 REVENUES BEFORE REIMBURSEMENTS TO GROW IN MID-SINGLE DIGITS
* EXPECT FULL YEAR 2018 EBITDA MARGIN TO DECLINE BY APPROXIMATELY 100 TO 150 BASIS POINTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
